imdb.title: Tales of Eternia: The Animation
imdb.plot: In order to prevent the catastrophe, the Grand Fall, Rid and his companions Farah, Keel and Meredy have obtained the Greater Spirits. A series of adventures forces them to remain on the islands, where a more immediate threat to In...

episodes.title: Adventure in Polar Worlds
episodes.plot: One day, Reid ventures into the forest in pursuit of his prey, where he meets the beautiful bard, Corina. She informs him of a "Haunted Swamp" nearby and warns him to stay away from there.

episodes.title: Bounty Hunter of the Sea
episodes.plot: Reid learns that Maronne is a professional monster hunter. The two are headed to the maritime city of Belcagne, which consists of many large and small islands with Verka as its capital.

episodes.title: It Blows Hard on the Southern Island
episodes.plot: After defeating the Ocean Demon, Farah rushes to prepare for the trip tomorrow, but the others want to relax first.

episodes.title: The Ultimate Women Showdown
episodes.plot: The Trial By Sea is to swim one lap around each of the nine islands. Any woman could participate, and the victor's wish will be fulfilled.

episodes.title: The Songstress' Elegy
episodes.plot: Belcagne is hit with a high demand for boats, causing the price of wood to skyrocket, and the group finds they don't have enough money for the materials.

episodes.title: Mystery of Belcagne
episodes.plot: Farah, Maronne, Meredy and Corina decide to look for a hot spring while Keele and Reid decide to investigate the ruins, and Keele finds the very same object, that Reid found on the ocean floor, on an altar in the town.

episodes.title: A Dark Wings' Special
episodes.plot: Three people calling themselves the "Dark Wings" wash onto Belcagne.

episodes.title: Night of Craymel Dust
episodes.plot: Excia revives an ancient festival called "Sea Festival".

episodes.title: The Stolen Greater Craymels
episodes.plot: Keele and Meredy, who were conducting research in the library, happen to catch a glimpse of Reid from the window and, in the moonlight, notice two figures approach Reid from behind

episodes.title: Falling in the Sunset
episodes.plot: The leader of the "Gospel of Nereid" steals the Greater Craymels. Reid and the others decide to flee to an uninhabited island where they can safely hide.

episodes.title: Corina
episodes.plot: The Gospel of Nereid, after obtaining the Greater Craymels, prepare to launch an all-out attack on Inferia under the command of their leader, the Golden Mask.

episodes.title: The Wedge of Punishment
episodes.plot: The ultimate weapon brought to Inferia from Celestia during the "Aurora War", also known as The Wedge of Punishment.

episodes.title: Departures
episodes.plot: Reid and the gang are stunned by the sheer power of the Craymel Cannon and as they stand awestruck, they see it adjusting its course to fire upon Inferia's castle.
